alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Mahoning; Portage; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 11:18AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northern Portage... southern Trumbull...northeastern Mahoning...southwestern Geauga and east central Cuyahoga Counties Until 1245 PM EST.... At 1117 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from near Garrettsville to near Campbell, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Youngstown, Warren, Parma, Lakewood, Cleveland Heights, Boardman, Solon, Niles, Streetsboro, Warrensville Heights, Campbell, Hubbard, Canfield, Newton Falls, South Russell, Lordstown, Garrettsville, Highland Hills, and Mantua. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 304, 307, 308, 310, 311, 317, 318, 319, 322, 323, 324, 328, 329, 619, and 620.
